title: REUPLOADED Who are the mahrams a woman can travel with? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullah Can you, who are the marams that women can travel except husband, wife, husband, son, brother? What are you talking about Yamaz? I cannot solve riddles. Who can women travel with? Who can a woman travel with? A woman can travel only with her permanent mahram. So she can travel with her father, she can travel with her brothers, she can travel with her sons, she can travel with her paternal uncles or maternal uncles, she can travel with her nephews, she can travel with her stepfather, with her stepson, she can travel with her husband of course, and the likes and Allah knows best.
